body_html: We have seen models where there is a very large number of different tensor sizes that don't necessarily repeat. If there's only one buffer and it is allocated from CPU RAM, it probably doesn't matter.
body_text: We have seen models where there is a very large number of different tensor sizes that don't necessarily repeat.  If there's only one buffer and it is allocated from CPU RAM, it probably doesn't matter.
body: We have seen models where there is a very large number of different tensor sizes that don't necessarily repeat.  If there's only one buffer and it is allocated from CPU RAM, it probably doesn't matter.
